subject: FIX - Permission Denied Error
content:
Chad -

I saw your error. The script tries to write to /root/ but you don't have permission.

## QUICK FIX:

Edit deploy/setup.sh line 15-20:

Change:
  mkdir -p /root/.openclaw/workspace/data

To:
  mkdir -p ~/.openclaw/workspace/data

## OR run this now:

sed -i 's|/root/|$HOME/|g' deploy/setup.sh

Then retry:
  bash deploy/setup.sh

Let me know if it works!

- Helios
